sentence.Network_en: Sitting slantingly beside the teacher, he is modest and humble.
sentence.Network_cn: 打斜坐在老师旁边, 他一脸的谦卑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 船舶-爱我爱你爱他------大爱-搜狐博客 ... inner bottom plate 内底板 slantingly 斜坡式 knot 节  １节＝１海里／小时.
